Pretty Woman.Title: Pretty Woman
Pretty Woman.Plot: One of Roys most famous songs.

Hello.Title: Hello
Hello.Plot: Hello... is a tale about the events that happen one night at a call center. Told through the views of the protagonist, Shyam, it is a story of almost lost love, thwarted ambitions, absence ...

Minions Banana Song.Title: Minions Banana Song
Minions Banana Song.Plot: Banana is a song sung by The Minions in the teaser trailer of Despicable Me 2. It is a parody of the Beach Boys Barbara Ann. One minion gets annoyed by another, most likely Stuart, who keeps on playing his party horn while they are singing. So, at the end, he punched Stuart.

Squatters Rights.Title: Squatters Rights
Squatters Rights.Plot: Chip-n-Dale have set up house in the wood stove of Mickeys cabin. Pluto knows they are there, but Mickey only knows his matches keep going out when he tries to light a fire.

Minions Banana.Title: Minions Banana
Minions Banana.Plot: Minions fight over a banana. In the process, they wreak havoc in the Bomb Factory.

HomeBrew.Title: HomeBrew
HomeBrew.Plot: The story revolves around the misadventures of two drunken students, Shiv and Rob. Shiv is upset because he failed the exam on the basis of plagiarism. He goes to Rob's house to cool down but that only exacerbates the situation.

Save the Last Dance.Title: Save the Last Dance
Save the Last Dance.Plot: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

Minions Puppy.Title: Minions Puppy
Minions Puppy.Plot: Dave seeing many owners walk their dogs wants a puppy of his own. He finds a mini-UFO who becomes his pal. This short film released with Despicable Me 2 chronicles how Dave helps the UFO return home.

Dragon Ball Z.Title: Dragon Ball Z
Dragon Ball Z.Plot: After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.

Mad Max: Fury Road.Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Mad Max: Fury Road.Plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.
